presentation_p: Welcome to my portfolio. I am Hugo DUPRAT and I will introduce you to my world. I am currently a second year student at the IUT in Angoulême, at MIT formation. This technological degree is very multidisciplinary, it leads us to work as much in the fields of the web as in multimedia communication. For the moment, you only see a single building, but inside each room there are multiple and varied skills! I suggest you go down the floors, to discover more about me.
